title: 【醒目】多mod服务器可以正常运行但是频繁崩溃。。。
author: TNT狂人。
txt_content:
本来服务器都是一切正常的，但是莫名其妙就直接崩溃。。。以下为最近一次崩溃的错误报告。。QAQ

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Uh... Did I do that?

Time: 16-8-7 下午2:05
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
        at java.util.HashMap$HashIterator.nextEntry(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.HashMap$KeyIterator.next(Unknown Source)

        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:658)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

replies.author: andylizi
replies.txt_content: 据我所知的唯一解决办法：换服务端。

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
DO NOT REPORT THIS CRASH! Unsupported mods in environment: bukkit

A.删除匠魂
Mantle
B.换thermos

replies.author: sc-k
replies.txt_content: 我已基于KCauldron1.7.10-1614.201版本修复该问题,请在此下载,链接:http://pan.baidu.com/s/1mh9p4pU 密码:aclc
